## MantarayNode.getDocsMetadata() method

Returns the `swarm-index-document` and `swarm-error-document` metadata values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDocsMetadata(): {
        indexDocument: string | null;
        errorDocument: string | null;
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ indexDocument: string \| null; errorDocument: string \| null; }
